It stands for tradition, quality and innovation.The productOur central product is an inside pocket, which fits easily into most women's handbags and can be changed easily from pocket to pocket. Thus, the entire bag contents can change quickly and orderly all women's handbags.Project requirementsWe are looking for a reliable partner who supports us on a long-term online marketing campaign. In particular, the following tasks are involved:1. Develop a suitable online marketing strategy2. SEO & SEA (especially implementation)3. Social media strategy (especially daily content management based)We are planning to hire a German partner to design the SEO, SEA and Social Media strategy (espcially to find the proper SEO key words etc.). But if you think you'll be able to take this task as well, feel free to convince us.Current statusYou can find our current website at [url removed, login to view]We are currently in the final stages of the implementation of a new website. We've developed these together with an advertising agency and developed it with shopware. The work was handed over to us without SEO Marketing.Our Facebook and Instagram profiles consist, but with little traffic.We have a large stock of professional product and mood pictures. We have also collected a lot of material for filling the social media pages with content. We can also gather more photo material created by our photographer ([url removed, login to view]).TimelineGo-live of the new website is planned in early August.This would be the optimal project start for the SEO & SEA work.Against the background of vacation times, a later project start is also possible.
